verses.content: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a:
“Mihriem naupa, hril la, hieng hin hril rawh, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ṭapinrûm unla, chungrikna ni chu!
Ni chu a hnai a, LALPA ni chu a hnai ta si a; Sûm zingna ni, Hnamhai sietna ni chu nîng a tih.

Aigupta chunga chun kâwlhnâm chu hung a ta, Ethiopiaa chun tuorna nasatak um a tih; Aiguptaa mi thata umhai an tlûk pha chun, A mipuihai chu la hmang an ta, A lungphûmhai khawm chu sukchim nîng a tih.
Ethiopia, Put le Lud mi chi inpawlhai chu, Kus mihai leh, ram ṭhangruolhai mihai chu anni le chun kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih.

LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Aigupta chelngirtuhai khawm chu tlûng an ta; A thilthawtheina chapona khawm hung inhnuoi a tih; Migdola inthawka Suene chenin kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a ti a nih.
Ram râusana umhai sûnga chun râusanin um vêng an ta, A khawpuihai khawm chu khawpui suksieta umhai laia chun ṭhang vêng a tih.
Aigupta rama chun mei ka sêm a, A ṭhangpuituhai po po sukbohmanga an um vawng pha chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

Chu nia chun Ethiopia mi pawisakna neilotuhai chu sukṭi dingin ka hmaa inthawkin mitirhai chu lawnghaiin suok an ta; an chunga chun tuorna nasatak, Aigupta nia ang khan um an tih, en ta, a hung mêk sih a.
“Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar kut hmangin Aigupta mipuihai chu sukrêm ka tih;
Ama le, a kuoma a mihai, hnamhai ṭisim chu ram sukse dinga hung ṭhuoilût nîng an ta, Aigupta chu doin an kâwlhnâmhai phawi an ta, ram chu mi thatin suksip an tih.

Chun, vadungpuihai khawm chu sukkangchat ka ta, ram chu mi rilohai kutah zawr ka tih; mikhuolhai kut hmangin ram le a sûnga umhai po po chu râusanah siem ka tih, kei LALPA ngeiin ka lo hril tah a nih.

“Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Milimhai chu suksieng ka ta, Nopha inthawkin milimhai chu intâwptir bawk ka tih; chun, Aigupta rama inthawk hin lal um nâwk ta naw ni hai a; Aigupta rama hin ṭiumna ka sie ding a nih.
Pathros chu râusanah siem ka ta, Zoana chun mei hung sêm ka ta, Noa rorêlnahai chu sukpuitling ka tih.
Chun, ka lunginsenna chu Sin chunga chun hung bunthlâng ka ta, Aigupta kul dettak chu; Noa mihai chu sât thlâng ka tih.
Aigupta rama chun mei hung tîng ka ta, Sin chu rinum nasatakin um a ta; Noa chu suksietin um a tih; chun, Noph chu lunginzîngtakin ni tin um a tih.
Aven le Pi-beseth tlangvâlhai chu kâwlhnâmin tlûng an ta, chun, hieng khawpuihai hi sala ṭhuoiin um an tih.

Tehaphnehesa chun ni chu hung inthim a ta, chu pha chun Aigupta rîngkawlhai chu suktliek ka ta, amaa chun a thilthawtheina cha- pona chu tâwp tâng a tih; ama chu sûmpuiin hung inkhum a ta, a naunuhmeihai chu salah fêng an tih.
Chuong ang tak chun Aiguptaa chun rorêlna chu sukpuitling ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.
Kum sâwmpakhatna, thla khat- na, chu thla a ni sarinaa chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta lal Pharao bân chu ka suktliek tah a; ngai ta, kâwlhnâm chawi ding tâwka hrât dingin, ngar khuoa tuom dingin, sukdamna damdawihai nâl dinga tuom a ni nawh a.
Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, Aigupta lal Pharao chu ka dodâl a, a tliek ta hnung a kut hrâthai chu suktliek ka tih;
chun, kâwlhnâm chu a kuta inthawkin intlâktir bawk ka tih. Chun, Aigupta mihai chu hnamhai laia chun sukdar ka ta, rambunghaia chun hnawt dar ka tih.
Babulon lal kuthai chu sukhrât ka ta, ka kâwlhnâm chu a kutah sieng ka tih; nisienlakhawm, Pharao bânhai chu suktliek ka ta, ama hmaa chun mi thi khawp raua hliem inrûm- in inrûm a tih.

Chun, Babulon lal bânhai chu chelngîrpêk ka ta, Pharao bânhai ruok chu tlahnuoi a tih; Babulon lal kutah ka kâwlhnâm ka sieh a, Aigupta ram chungah ama chun ân let pha chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.
Chun, Aigupta mihai chu hnam- hai laia chun sukdar ka ta, rambung- haia chun hnawt dar ka tih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih, ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.
